projectDescription: This project aims to provide clean and safe drinking water to the impoverished village of [Village Name] through the construction of several water wells. The village currently suffers from a lack of access to clean water, resulting in health issues and a significant burden on daily life, especially for women and children who spend hours fetching water from distant sources.

milestones.title: Project Initiation and Planning
milestones.description: Conduct a feasibility study, Identify the best locations for the wells, Develop a detailed project plan, Secure necessary permits and licenses, Establish a local project team

milestones.title: Procurement and Mobilization
milestones.description: Procure necessary equipment and materials, Hire construction crew, Transport equipment and materials to the site
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of the total budget will be released upon the completion of this phase.

milestones.title: Construction of the First Well
milestones.description: Prepare the site, Drill the well, Install pump and piping, Test water quality
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of the total budget will be released upon the completion of this phase.

milestones.title: Construction of Remaining Wells
milestones.description: Repeat the processes from Milestone 3 for remaining wells
milestones.paymentDetails: : 30% of the total budget will be released upon the completion of this phase.

milestones.title: Project Closure and Community Training
milestones.description: Conduct final water quality tests, Train local community members on well maintenance and water safety, Document project and handover to the community, Demobilize equipment and crew
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of the total budget will be released upon the completion of this phase.
